attributes.action: Gor Davtian (age 15) should be rewarded £1 million so he can help his parents with thier problems and make them proud and happy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My name is Gor Davtian my parents are having problems at the moment, I so wish i could have money to make them feel happy, they do everything for me and my little sister. Please sign this petition if you like I am not forcing anybody to do it but it would make my family so happy and we could start a new life away from violence and racism.
People just do not realise how much parents do for us we always as teenagers love to blame them for things that we do wrong. They have cared for us from the day we came to this world and always will love us aslong as they are alive. REMEMBER THERE IS NEVER A BAD PARENT ONLY A BAD CHILD

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
